Original Ghosts.Name: Original Blinky
Original Ghosts.Description:
The leader of the Ghost gang and the deadliest of the four.\
                Being the first to exit the Ghost house, Blinky will straightforwardly chase you down after some time,\
                getting faster the longer you stay in the level.\
                Watch out for him and his friend Inky, who helps Blinky intercept Pac-man.

Original Ghosts.Name: Original Pinky
Original Ghosts.Description:
The often girl of the Ghost gang and the most cunning.\
                Being the second to exit the Ghost house, Pinky might be the hardest Ghost to deal with for newer players,\
                using ambush tactics to chase Pac-man, predicting where he will go based on his trajectory.\
                Once Understanding how Pinky chases, you can easily avoid her ambushes.

Original Ghosts.Name: Original Inky
Original Ghosts.Description:
The most bizarre Ghost of the gang, mainly acting as an assist for Blinky.\
                Blinky comes out after Pac-man has eaten a specific amount of pellets and chases Pac-man\
                based on where Blinky's trajectory is. Where Blinky is, Inky is soon to follow,\
                which can lead to Pac-man being trapped between two ghosts. Luckily, Inky himself never chases Pac-man\
                himself, so as long as you know that, Inky can be easily avoided.

Original Ghosts.Name: Original Clyde
Original Ghosts.Description:
The last and... probably least of the Ghost gang. Clyde would be considered a free soul,\
                never exactly chasing Pac-man, but going about in random directions. But, if Pac-man is close enough,\
                Clyde will essentially scurry away to a set location. Don't underestimate Clyde, though, he can still kill\
                Pac-man and, because of his unpredictability, don't be surprised to bump into Clyde when you\
                least expect it.

Original Ghosts.Name: Kinky
Original Ghosts.Description:
The oddball of the Ghost Group, shrouded in mystery. Kinky is both a blessing and\
                a hinderince, having the unique ability to fuse with Blinky, Pinky, Inky and/or Clyde,\
                resulting in changing the Ghost gang into stronger opponents. Rather than chasing Pac-man, Kinky\
                chases the Ghosts, and, when acheiving contact, does the aforementioned fusing.\
                The longer Pac-man stays in a level and the farther the game progresses, Kinky will\
                fuse with more ghosts and at a faster pace.\
                The upside to this is that Kinky is (Until world 4), permanently in a vulnerable state of which\
                Pac-man can and SHOULD eat, as that Kinky doubles as a Power-pellet.\
                If you run out of power-pellets, if Kinky is around, he can really help out.

Powered Ghosts.Name: Powered Blinky
Powered Ghosts.Description:
With Kinky's transformation, Blinky now personafies as a charging bull, with horns to boot.\
		  		His tactic stays the same, chasing Pac-man with haste in a straight-forward fashion. But, this time \
		  Blinky has a charge move that sends him flying toward Pac-man at a horizontal position. While this sounds \
		  like a big problem, Blinky's horizontal criteria and big start up animation leaves his charge very easy to \
		  avoid. Powered Blinky is still the most dangerous Ghost to be around, but his upgrade is, luckily, \
		  not much.

Powered Ghosts.Name: Powered Pinky
Powered Ghosts.Description:
With Kinky's transformation, Pinky grows bunny ears and has a more friendly demeanor. \
		  But don't let her new looks fool you, she's still out for pac blood and has a new ability in the \
		  form of a jump that will send Pinky to Pac-man's current location. New players beware, as Pinky's \
		  jump is quick and will have you breathing over you in now time. But for the more seasoned players, \
		  Powered Pinky's ability is quite easy to avoid, as her move is telegraphed with a symbol of where \
		  she's land, and her landing animation takes time.

Powered Ghosts.Name: Powered Inky
Powered Ghosts.Description:
With Kinky's transformation, Inky gains some confidence with a pair of shades. \
		  But, Inky's cool demeaner doesn't mean he's too cool for a tussle. Becoming one of the most \
		  dangerous ghosts on the maze, Inky splits into TWO ghosts that mirror the original Inky's \
		  position, essentially creating a 6th ghost! The saving grace is that the mirror only lasts \
		  a couple seconds, and can be interrupted with power-pellets and the Pink pill. Powered Inky \
		  is a menace, especially if Kinky choses to chase him first, so be sure to keep your \
		  power-pellets close by.

Powered Ghosts.Name: Powered Clyde
Powered Ghosts.Description:
With Kinky's transformation, Clyde becomes a portly fellow which, somehow, makes \
		  him most dangerous Ghost on the maze. But not in terms of power or attack prowess. \
		  But in the ability to CREATE FAT PELLETS! Clyde will do his usual wondering around the maze, \
		  occasionally spitting out pellets in rows. This is a big problem, as the longer you're in \
		  in a level, the more dangerous the level gets. You may think that you have all the \
		  pellets eaten, but Clyde has other plans, scattering new pellets in places you have \
		  struggle to get to. If Kinky is in a bad mood and transforms Clyde first, good luck...
